DzDefaultInParam Class Reference
[Shader Mixer Classes]

DzBrickParam for parameters that have a default input of a global variable such as P, V, Or N. More...

#include <dzdefaultinparam.h>

Detailed Description

DzBrickParam for parameters that have a default input of a global variable such as P, V, Or N.

See also:
DzShaderBrick::addDefaultInParameter

void DzDefaultInParam::loadSection ( DzInFile *  file,
short  sectionID 
) [virtual]

Called by the framework to allow this object to load data for the given section. Derived classes override this method to read section data from the native file format.

Parameters:
file The file to read from
sectionID The section ID of the section to read.
